data.title: The Daughter of Time
data.meta_description: A staged reading of The Daughter of Time took place as part of the Middleham Richard III Festival
data.text:
A staged reading of a new play version of The Daughter of Time took place as part of the Middleham Richard III Festival.

The play was written by M Kilburg Reedy, and based on Josephine Teyâ€™s famous 1951 novel The Daughter of Time. The reading was held at the Key Centre, Middleham on Sunday 7th July, and featured a full cast, including Susannah Harker as Marta Hallard and Alan Cox as Inspector Alan Grant.
